title: Best of The Herd: 05/21/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/21/2019
description:
Colin reassures dramatic West Coast NBA fans that the West will open up with so many free agents looking East. And, even with Kevin Durant most likely leaving the Warriors, everything will be just fine in Golden State without him. It looks like LeBron's entire career is going to end in the same dramatic fashion it began, in mayhem, since the Lakers are a total mess ripping the cape off of superman, LeBron cannot overcome their bad management.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
